Package gnu.vnc.awt

Class Summary
VNCDesktop AWT toolkit implemented entirely with JFC peers supporting multiple RFB client, thus allowing a lightweight remote simulation of the operating system desktop.
VNCEvents Generates AWT events from RFB events for multiple RFB clients.
VNCEvents.State  
VNCFrame A virtual AWT frame that supports multiple RFB clients.
VNCJFrame A virtual JFC frame that supports multiple RFB clients.
VNCOwnerRepaintManager Manages a PixelsOwner for VNCRepaintManager.
VNCRepaintManager A JFC repaint manager that writes to VNC queues.
VNCRobot A very limited implementation of a Robot that supports RFB clients.
